GATE.description: Travellers in and out of $TOWN$ are carefully watched by armed guards.

moves.prompt: Join the bustle of the main street.

LEAVE.description: You are on the outskirts of $TOWN$.

moves.prompt: Enter the town by the main gate.

MAINST.description: The main street of $TOWN$ is bustling with activity.

moves.prompt: Leave the town through the main gate.
